def_cn: (建筑物外壁的)覆层;室外装饰
def_en: Cladding is a covering of tiles, wooden boards, or other material that is fixed to the outside of a building to protect it against bad weather or to make it look more attractive.

def_cn: (核反应堆中燃料棒外的)金属涂层，镀层
def_en: Cladding is a layer of metal which is put round fuel rods in a nuclear reactor.
